original_title: Sono io il mio nemico pi√π grande
overview: The movie tells the life of Riccardo Bianchini, in art Mr. Cipo, an entertainer in resorts. It's shot partly in his house, where he spends the winter, and partly in the resort in which he spends the summer working. The dialogues are all about animation, life in the resort, guests etc. What happens in this world that seems to be at the same time a nightmare, a dream and a circus?
title: I am my own worst enemy
